mdRecord.dcterms:title: Six sonates en trio pour deux violons et basse / dédiée à Milord John lord Viscount Bateman par Mr. Martin. Oeuvre Ier. Gravé par Melle Laymon
Martin, François, 1727-1757. Trios, strings, violin (2), bass
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Martin, François, 1727-1757
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: First title in set with cover title: Trios de divers auteurs. The individual parts for each title are bound in the successive volumes so all 3 volumes of the set should be requested to get the complete work.

mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Trio sonatas--Parts
